page.title: 18BANK AND PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content:
{ National Westminster Bank} This is part of the Alderley Edge branch. Two people work here, one of whom is permanent. The customers are farmers and local people.
{The Egerton Arms This is a 'chef and brewer' tavern, run by The Grand Metropolitan Group. Meals are served at lunch and in the evening. There is one bar and a fruit machine.
{The Stag's Head This pub belongs to Boddingtons. Lunch and evening meals are served. There is very little passing trade. Most regular customers are local-farmers, staff and teachers from the hospitals and members of the Golf Club. The Stag's Head Golf Trophy is presented on an annual basis.
